verses.verse: PSALM 101The Psalmistâ€™s Profession of Uprightness.A Psalm of David. I will sing of mercy and (Or judgment) justice; To You, LORD, I will sing praises.
I will carefully attend to the (Or way of integrity) blameless way. When will You come to me? I will walk within my house in the (Or blamelessness) integrity of my heart.
I will set no worthless thing before my eyes; I hate the (Or practice of apostasy) work of those who fall away; It shall not cling to me.
A perverse heart shall leave me; I will know no evil.
Whoever secretly slanders his neighbor, him I will (Or silence) destroy; I will not endure one who has a haughty look and an arrogant heart.
My eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me; One who walks in a (Or way of integrity) blameless way is one who will serve me.
One who practices deceit shall not dwell within my house; One who speaks lies shall not (Lit be established before my eyes) maintain his position before me.
Every morning I will (Or silence) destroy all the wicked of the land, So as to eliminate from the city of the LORD all those who do injustice.
